quote: Then he realized: 'I, indeed, am this creation; for I have poured it forth from myself.' In that way he became this creation. And verily, he who knows this becomes in this creation a creator.
quote_letters: THEN HE REALIZED I INDEED AM THIS CREATION FOR I HAVE POURED IT FORTH FROM MYSELF IN THAT WAY HE BECAME THIS CREATION AND VERILY HE WHO KNOWS THIS BECOMES IN THIS CREATION A CREATOR
